name: Glorious Ammon
description:
Glorious Ammon is the first artwork of
the collage/animation series A
Kingdom in Pieces. Created in
analogue form in 2006 and digitally
animated in 2020. Ammon is
opening a dialogue about the
similarities of Christian religion with
the ancient Egyptian one. Sometimes
Zeus and others God Almighty but
always a strong father figure adapting
through history and always remaining
the same.
